ch0329_00_ortiga/0101_0701_02_10:
Come on! You made ME wait, so hurry up and
get ready!
ch0329_00_ortiga/7101_0701_01_10: Hey, do you know where I can find a piano?
ch0329_00_ortiga/7101_0701_02_10: I want to practice so I don’t get rusty.
ch0329_00_ortiga/7101_0701_03_10:
...And just so you know, there’s no way you’re
hearing me play. Got it?
ch0329_00_ortiga/7102_0701_01_10:
Ugh, what’s that question even mean?
I just don’t get it.
ch0329_00_ortiga/7102_0701_02_10:
Maybe I’ll just ask someone like Penny.
It’d be faster than figuring it out on my own.
ch0329_00_ortiga/7102_0701_04_10:
I’m thinking about homework right now.
Let’s talk another time. Bye!
ch0329_00_ortiga/7103_0701_01_10: Hey, is it true this island’s artificial?
ch0329_00_ortiga/7103_0701_02_10:
Someone actually made this massive island, huh.
It’s wild they even came up with the idea.
ch0329_00_ortiga/7104_0701_01_10: I wonder if Mela’s getting along with others.
ch0329_00_ortiga/7104_0701_02_10:
Being rude and saying mean things is literally
her whole deal, so...
ch0329_00_ortiga/7104_0701_03_10: What? Why’re you staring at me like that?
ch0329_00_ortiga/7104_0701_04_10: If you’ve got something to say, spit it out!
ch0329_00_ortiga/7105_0701_01_10:
Arrrghhh! What the HECK!!! Why are all the
Trainers here on Pasio SO strong?
ch0329_00_ortiga/7105_0701_02_10: I don’t get it—there’s way too many of them!
ch0329_00_ortiga/7105_0701_03_10:
You know what, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Come help me train!
ch0329_00_ortiga/7105_0701_04_10:
I have to keep getting stronger until I’M
number one!
ch0329_00_ortiga/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, there you are. Here, this is for you.
ch0329_00_ortiga/1701_0702_01_10:
I wouldn’t give it to you if I didn’t have extra.
It’s yours now—go wild or whatever.
ch0329_00_ortiga/2501_0701_01_10: Many people on Pasio dress so...unique.
ch0329_00_ortiga/2501_0701_02_10:
My family owns a clothing company, so I notice
stuff like that.
ch0329_00_ortiga/2501_0701_04_10: I guess it’s not so bad.
ch0329_00_ortiga/2501_0702_01_10:
Sometimes, people complain about my family
and upbringing. It’s SO annoying!
ch0329_00_ortiga/2501_0702_02_10: To shut them up, I have to get even stronger!
ch0329_00_ortiga/2501_0702_03_10:
Which means YOU need to step up and help me!
Got it?
ch0329_00_ortiga/2511_0701_01_10:
Hey, are you good at any subjects? Like, are you
more into humanities or science?
ch0329_00_ortiga/2511_0701_02_10:
If you’re struggling with stuff like math or science,
I wouldn’t mind teaching you.
ch0329_00_ortiga/2511_0701_03_10:
Just don’t ask me about literature and stuff like
that. I wouldn’t know.
ch0329_00_ortiga/2511_0702_01_10:
I just think the questions they ask in those subjects
are the worst.
ch0329_00_ortiga/2511_0702_02_10:
Like, how am I supposed to know how some
made-up characters feel? I’m not psychic!
ch0329_00_ortiga/3001_0701_01_10:
Well, look who’s here this morning. You’re cool to
battle me, right?
ch0329_00_ortiga/3003_0701_01_10:
Had lunch yet? If not, I suppose you could join me.
I’m just about to head out.
ch0329_00_ortiga/3005_0701_01_10: Why are you still awake? Go to bed already.
